name: Elder Grimwald
examine: A wise old man with years of experience.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome, young adventurer. Our village could use your help.
idle: The goblins have been getting bolder lately...
I remember when I was young like you...

name: Captain Morris
examine: The captain of the city guard.

dialogue.greeting: Ah, an adventurer! The city guard could use someone with your skills.
idle: Crime has been on the rise lately.
We're always looking for capable individuals.

name: Mage Elara
examine: A mysterious mage studying ancient magic.

dialogue.greeting: Greetings, adventurer. I sense magical potential in you.
idle: The flow of magic has been... disturbed lately.
These ancient texts hold many secrets.
